Projects

These are some of the projects I worked on during my web development course. They were guided, but I still had to figure out layouts, fix bugs, and make things look good on any screen. It was a great hands-on way to learn and improve.

Love Running

A responsive site for a fictional running club, featuring event info, a gallery, and a sign-up form.

Visit Website

Mei Wong Portfolio

A responsive portfolio site for a fictional developer, featuring About and Contact sections with a clean, mobile-friendly design.

Visit Website

Boardwalk Games

A responsive site for a fictional board game café, with event info, booking form, and mobile-friendly layout.

Visit Website
